headlines.description: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang scored a goal either side of half-time with Alx Iwobi adding a late third as Arsenal beat Burnley 3-1.
headlines.shortLinkText: Aubameyang nets two in win over Burnley

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at AFC Bournemouth

headlines.description: Midfielder David Brooks continued his fine run of form with a superb brace to earn Bournemouth a 2-0 home win over 10-man Brighton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brooks brace gives Bournemouth win vs. Brighton

headlines.description: Jamie Vardy's well-taken breakaway goal helped Leicester to earn a 1-0 win at Chelsea on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Vardy earns Leicester narrow win at Chelsea

headlines.description: Southampton continued their revival under Ralph Hasenhuettl as goals from Nathan Redmond, Danny Ings and Michael Obafemi sealed a 3-1 win.
Manchester City suffered their first home Premier League loss in eight months with a shock 3-2 defeat to Crystal Palace on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man City suffer first home defeat in 8 months

headlines.description: Fulham secured their first clean sheet of the season with some dogged defending in a 0-0 draw with Newcastle United.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fulham earn first clean sheet in Newcastle draw

headlines.description: Watford brought West Ham United's streak of Premier League success to an abrupt halt with a surprise 2-0 win at the London Stadium on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Deeney, Deulofeu seal Watford win at West Ham

headlines.description: Goals from Marcus Rashford, Ander Herrera, Anthony Martial and a Jesse Lingard double secured a 5-1 win for Manchester United against Cardiff.
headlines.shortLinkText: United win in style in first post-Mourinho match
